title: Spider-Man Mega Collection - Part 03 (of 06) (- Nem -)
description:
Includes - Amazing Spider-Man 001 - 700

           Story Arcs (collected)

           Amazing Spider-Man 0700.1 - 0700.5

           Amazing Spider-Man Annuals (01 - 39)


This Spider-Man collection will come in 6 parts and has about everything that could be located that`s of any importance to the fan/collector of the Spider-Man comics - it will include all Series and Spin-off series (Spider-Girl/Woman) Venom, Scarlet Spider, etc) plus one-shots, mini-series, specials, giveaway, hell . . they even put Spidey on toilet paper (poor guy).
I`m sure the completests among you will be able to point to an issue here or a toothpaste giveaway there that`s been overlooked - but hopefully i`ll be able to send the Ninjas round before you get to the keyboard - seriously though - anything overlooked let me know.

Digital issues have been used whenever available.

There maybe duplicate files in this collection - it`s not intentional, just a bad memory.

This is not all my doing - the bulk of this collection belongs to animehunt who kindly mailed me a Spidey packed drive - and I just compiled the collection as it is now and filled in a few gaps - of which there weren`t many.

Credit goes to the Original scanners/rippers, and animehunt without whom this wouldn`t have been possible.

Thankyou. Nem.

Enjoy.
